title: ISic000628. Epitaph of Abdalas
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) M(anibus) s(acrum)
Abdalas Domi-
tiae Domitiani
magister magnus
5ovium qui bene vix(it)
in officio ann(os) LXXX

Apparatus criticus

English translation

Sacred to the spirits of the dead; Abdalas, (slave of) Domitia (wife of) Domitian, great master of the sheep, who lived well in his job; eighty years old

commentary

bibliography

  • 1985.0483 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Wilson 1990 215 n.102 fig.175 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001509
  • Salmeri 1984 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001608
  • Manganaro 1988 17 n.62 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
